entry.title: Yellow Paper Daisy
entry.summary:
Author: Babysterek

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 71,358Chapters: 22/25Kudos: 151

Summary: “Well,” Peter says at last, forcing a crooked smile into his voice, “at least this time he didn’t almost get us all killed.”Derek swallows. His throat is dry, the words scraping on the way out. “I was drunk.” They land and disappear without effect.Talia turns then, her gaze settling on him fully. It’s steady, unreadable, and it makes his shoulders tense despite himself. “You were careless,” she says. “You are a werewolf, and if you got drunk, you laced it with wolfsbane, you did it. Do you understand, In twenty-four years, every scandal has had the same root. You. At some point, it stops being bad luck and becomes character. And I am tired of pretending this is something that merely happens to you.”---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Derek just wanted a moment of quiet. Instead, he crosses a line with the last person he should trust.....old grudges, bad decisions and a mistake he keeps repeating. "He learned the shape of the poison once,from a woman who wore it like skin.Now hemlock blooms in his own hands,and he cannot tell where she ends and he begins. "

Now everything was up to him.

entry.title: the moon is the only witness
entry.summary:
Author: idgaf_as

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 21,412Chapters: 4/4Kudos: 57

Summary: A couple of minutes later, he feels Stiles begin to stir and press closer. Apparently, the living heater in the form of Derek suited him just fine. The boy turns onto his side, fully hugging him like a toy now, and buries his fingers into the fur at the scruff of his neck. Derek feels him press his forehead against the top of his head. He goes still, listening as Stiles’s pulse beneath his head begins to even out, becoming steady and strong. The sticky scent of exhaustion gradually gives way to the fragrance of peaceful sleep

entry.title: Wrong(Right)Turn
entry.summary:
Author: Nightowl_22

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,829Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 6

Summary: Stiles is still reeling from his breakup with Lydia a year ago, using punishing runs through the park to escape the memories that haunt him. But when a wrong turn leads him to a secluded clearing—and then to a mysteriously open car door—his routine shatters in the most unexpected way. Enter Derek, a confident stranger with emerald eyes and an invitation Stiles can't refuse and challenges everything he thought he knew about himself. Or the one where Stiles stumbles upon a half-naked Derek, ass up, denies his attraction until he can't, and discovers that healing a broken heart might just involve a mind-blowing hookup.

entry.title: Where Ashes Lie
entry.summary:
Author: TendreChaos

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 195,517Chapters: 34/40Kudos: 184

Summary: Stiles has always known he was different, that there was something inside him people were afraid of.In a society where the supernatural is hunted and contained, sorcerers are stripped of their names, their freedom, and their humanity. After months of captivity behind concrete walls, Stiles manages to escape and disappears into the woods, where he finds a rebel group willing to take him in. But trust is fragile and Stiles carries a secret, a power he barely understands and cannot share.Because if they knew the truth, if they knew what Stiles really was... They wouldn’t hate the cage that once held him.They’d build a stronger one.

entry.title: Growing Sideways
entry.summary:
Author: dandeliondick

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,827Chapters: 1/3Kudos: 10

Summary: He had wished he had some way to contact Derek. He used to send him emails every week during the hunt. He sent one every month that first year, but after a while it just slipped his mind, raising a kid and running a pack taking up his time instead of an outbox of unanswered emails. He doubted that Derek would ever come back, Beacon Hills had caused him nothing but pain since he was just a kid. He just wished he could meet Luke. He wanted him to see how strong and how good he was even after all of that. He wanted Derek to see Luke’s beta form and that his Blue eyes are a symbol of just how much he has survived. That everyday he sees Erica’s fire and Boyd’s steadiness in how Luke plays and talks. Maybe he wanted to show Derek that Beacon Hills was somewhere worth coming back to now, that it was a home now. - In blue ink, 54 W Beacon Preserve Dr, Beacon Hills. Derek didn’t take the napkin, he already knew the address by heart since Talia made him memorize it and the house phone number before the first day of kindergarten. The Hale house.

entry.title: A Fragile Thing
entry.summary:
Author: OyasumiPunPun

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,913Chapters: 3/10Kudos: 22

Summary: Derek Hale wanders into a forgotten corner of the city one rainy night, drawn by the pull of cyber-jazz from a hidden stairwell. Inside an underground gallery, one painting stops him cold—and then the artist does.Stiles Stilinski, with amber eyes, turpentine-stained hands, and an unsettling way of seeing right through people, offers something Derek has never allowed himself to want.One encounter. One fragile thing.And the carefully constructed life he’s trapped in—marriage, family, name—begins to crack.

entry.title: In the Spaces Between
entry.summary:
Author: simplyn2deep

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,499Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 13

Summary: The first time Derek Hale and Stiles Stilinski spent time together on purpose, it wasn’t because of a body. It wasn’t because of a rogue alpha or a hunter or some supernatural catastrophe that required Stiles’ frantic brain and Derek’s terrifying eyebrows. It was because Stiles’ Jeep died. Again.

entry.title: Run Boy Run
entry.summary:
Author: myswordhandissinging

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 33,306Chapters: 15/?Kudos: 809

Summary: Stiles Stilinski knew he should have stayed in to finish his assignment that was due on Monday. Instead, he had to go investigate with the pack. He knew he was going to regret it later, and he probably should have listened to his instincts. When he goes missing, the pack finds him in the same spot after days of searching.   Or the one where Stiles goes missing for a couple of days and comes back blind and with magical powers. What did that bitch do to him?   *This was first published in 2013 as a teenager. Now, as an adult with a developed frontal lobe, the age difference between Derek and Stiles is only 2 years, with Stiles as an 18-year-old high school senior and Derek being 20-years-old.
